alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Kershaw; Lee; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:35PM EDT until August 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Lee County in central South Carolina... North central Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... South central Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 635 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near SC State Fair Grounds to near Congaree National Park, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Sumter, McEntire Air Base, South Sumter, Shaw Air Base, Eastover, Congaree National Park, Hopkins, Oakland, Horrel Hill, Sumter County Airport, Gadsden, Millwood, Mulberry, Cane Savannah, Dalzell, Dinkins Mill, Wedgewood, Boykin, and Cherryvale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina near mile marker 103. Interstate 77 between mile markers 5 and 9. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
